title: Mohini Lyrics Meendum Oru Kadhal Kadhai
stanzas:
<div>
Mohini Lyrics Meendum Oru Kadhal Kadhai

Mohini mannil vandhu
enna seiyya pogiraalo.
yaengum ila nenjai koithu
yaezham vida pogiraalo.

thaen thuligal
paarvai aanaal
paarkkum porul
ennavaagum.

indha nodi vazhnthuvitten
aayul ini kaetka maatten.

thoongavillai or iravu
thoorathile paal nilavu
idhayam muzhudhum
un mugam
idhayam padhintha
niyaabagam.

ellaam ellaam
nodi neramthaanae
polla pollaa kanavu

indre kanden
adhan pinbu naane
agaalam andruthaan.

vennilavu megathile
maraivathu pol
maraindhavalae.
veliye varum naal naalaiyo
ulagam urangum velaiyaa

varanum varanum
enakkaagave nee
idhayam idhayam muzhudhum

eriyum eriyum
anaiyaatha thee thee
en dheva thoodhan nee.

Mohini mannil vandhu
enna seiyya pogiraalo.
yaengum ila nenjai koithu
yaezham vida pogiraalo.

thaen thuligal
paarvai aanaal
paarkkum porul
ennavaagum.

indha nodi vazhnthuvitten
aayul ini kaetka maatten.
